BUMP gave ELITA a hard look as he sat there watching her. He folded
his =
hands together carefully as he breathed in and then out, a calming
gesture.=
 "You do realize that there are some individuals who actually
like being al=
one? People who enjoy reading in solitude rather then
being in the company =
of many."

Glancing irritably at the door he carefully pulled his PADD towa=
rds
him, "As far as Perceptor goes, I don't hate the mech, but I don't
nece=
ssarily like him, I just don't really know him." BUMP shrugged.
"You can't =
expect everyone to like him in a day or even a few weeks.
He has hurt peopl=
e for years, or at least helped those he have."

Looking up at TALON he nod=
ded, "I am not sure if there are answers to
